snippet: Hyatt said Thursday that it found malicious software in about 250 of its hotels that may have exposed customers’ credit and debit card numbers and other information to hackers.
abstract: Hyatt reports discovery of malicious software in payment systems of almost 250 of its hotels, saying threat was operative from July to December; warn that credit card and other customer information may have been stolen.
lead_paragraph: Hyatt said Thursday that it found malicious software in about 250 of its hotels that may have exposed customers’ credit and debit card numbers and other information to hackers.

headline.print_headline: Malicious Software Found at 250 Hyatt Hotels
headline.main: Malicious Software Found at 250 Hyatt Hotels
